column4: i broke my login manager booter? instead of gdm login i just get shell. how do i fix?
did you try to change nvidia-glx?
i was playing around with kubuntu and i changed something?

I have some problems in Ubuntu Feisty with my nvidia-glx and I when at login I get the shell, I I'm doing "sudo nano /etc/X11/xorg.conf" without quotes and I chande the driver in section Device to "nv" again without quotes in order to get GDM again
